00055 std::string CommandShell::ms_history_file = "";
00056 
00057 namespace {
00058   void termination_handler (int signum) {
00059     write_history(CommandShell::ms_history_file.c_str());
00060     exit(1);
00061   }
00062 
00063   const char *help_text = 
00064   "\n" \
00065   "Interpreter Meta Commands\n" \
00066   "-------------------------\n" \
00067   "?          (\\?) Synonym for `help'.\n" \
00068   "clear      (\\c) Clear command.\n" \
00069   "exit       (\\q) Exit program. Same as quit.\n" \
00070   "print      (\\p) Print current command.\n" \
00071   "quit       (\\q) Quit program.\n" \
00072   "source <f> (.)  Execute commands in file <f>.\n" \
00073   "system     (\\!) Execute a system shell command.\n" \
00074   "\n";
00075 }

00081 CommandShell::CommandShell(std::string program_name, CommandInterpreterPtr &interp_ptr, po::variables_map &vm) : m_program_name(program_name), m_interp_ptr(interp_ptr), m_varmap(vm), m_batch_mode(false), m_no_prompt(false), m_cont(false), m_line_read(0) {
00082   m_prompt_str = program_name + "> ";
00083 }

00089 char *CommandShell::rl_gets () {
00090   if (m_line_read) {
00091     free (m_line_read);
00092     m_line_read = (char *)NULL;
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* Get a line from the user. */
00096   if (m_batch_mode || m_no_prompt) {
00097     if (!getline(cin, m_input_str))
00098       return 0;
00099     boost::trim(m_input_str);
00100     if (m_input_str.find("quit", 0) != 0)
00101       cout << m_input_str << endl;
00102     return (char *)m_input_str.c_str();
00103   }
00104   else if (!m_cont)
00105     m_line_read = readline(m_prompt_str.c_str());
00106   else
00107     m_line_read = readline("         -> ");
00108 
00109   /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00110   if (!m_batch_mode && m_line_read && *m_line_read)
00111     add_history (m_line_read);
00112 
00113   return m_line_read;
00114 }

00118 void CommandShell::add_options(po::options_description &desc) {
00119   desc.add_options()
00120     ("batch", "Disable interactive behavior")
00121     ("config", po::value<std::string>(), "Configuration file.  The default config file is \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install directory")
00122     ("no-prompt", "Do not display an input prompt")
00123     ("timestamp-format", po::value<std::string>(), "Output format for timestamp.  Currently the only formats are 'default' and 'usecs'")
00124     ;
00125 }

00131 int CommandShell::run() {
00132   const char *line;
00133   queue<string> command_queue;
00134   std::string command;
00135   std::string timestamp_format;
00136   std::string source_commands;
00137   const char *base, *ptr;
00138 
00139   ms_history_file = (std::string)getenv("HOME") + "/." + m_program_name + "_history";
00140 
00141   m_batch_mode = m_varmap.count("batch") ? true : false;
00142   m_no_prompt = m_varmap.count("no-prompt") ? true : false;
00143   if (m_varmap.count("timestamp-format"))
00144     timestamp_format = m_varmap["timestamp-format"].as<string>();
00145 
00146   if (timestamp_format != "")
00147     m_interp_ptr->set_timestamp_output_format(timestamp_format);
00148 
00149   if (!m_batch_mode) {
00150 
00151     read_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00152 
00153     cout << endl;
00154     cout << "Welcome to the " << m_program_name << " command interpreter." << endl;
00155     cout << "For information about Hypertable, visit http://www.hypertable.org/" << endl;
00156     cout << endl;
00157     cout << "Type 'help' for a list of commands, or 'help shell' for a" << endl;
00158     cout << "list of shell meta commands." << endl;
00159     cout << endl << flush;
00160   }
00161 
00162   if (signal (SIGINT, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00163     signal (SIGINT, SIG_IGN);
00164   if (signal (SIGHUP, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00165     signal (SIGHUP, SIG_IGN);
00166   if (signal (SIGTERM, termination_handler) == SIG_IGN)
00167     signal (SIGTERM, SIG_IGN);
00168 
00169   m_accum = "";
00170   if (!m_batch_mode)
00171     using_history();
00172   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00173 
00174     try {
00175 
00176       if (*line == 0)
00177         continue;
00178 
00179       if (!strncasecmp(line, "help shell", 10)) {
00180         cout << help_text;
00181         continue;
00182       }
00183       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "help", 4) || !strncmp(line, "\\h", 2) || *line == '?') {
00184         command = line;
00185         std::transform( command.begin(), command.end(), command.begin(), ::tolower );
00186         trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00187         m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00188         continue;
00189       }
00190       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "quit") || !strcasecmp(line, "exit") || !strcmp(line, "\\q")) {
00191         if (!m_batch_mode)
00192           write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00193         return 0;
00194       }
00195       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "print") || !strcmp(line, "\\p")) {
00196         cout << m_accum << endl;
00197         continue;
00198       }
00199       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "clear") || !strcmp(line, "\\c")) {
00200         m_accum = "";
00201         m_cont = false;
00202         continue;
00203       }
00204       else if (!strncmp(line, "source", 6) || line[0] == '.') {
00205         if ((base = strchr(line, ' ')) == 0) {
00206           cout << "syntax error: source or '.' must be followed by a space character" << endl;
00207           continue;
00208         }
00209         std::string fname = base;
00210         trim_if(fname, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00211         off_t flen;
00212         if ((base = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(fname.c_str(), &flen)) == 0)
00213           continue;
00214         source_commands = "";
00215         ptr = strtok((char *)base, "\n\r");
00216         while (ptr != 0) {
00217           command = ptr;
00218           boost::trim(command);
00219           if (command.find("#") != 0)
00220             source_commands += command + " ";
00221           ptr = strtok(0, "\n\r");
00222         }
00223         if (source_commands == "")
00224           continue;
00225         delete [] base;
00226         line = source_commands.c_str();
00227       }
00228       else if (!strncasecmp(line, "system", 6) || !strncmp(line, "\\!", 2)) {
00229         std::string command = line;
00230         size_t offset = command.find_first_of(' ');
00231         if (offset != std::string::npos) {
00232           command = command.substr(offset+1);
00233           trim_if(command, boost::is_any_of(" \t\n\r;"));
00234           system(command.c_str());
00235         }
00236         continue;
00237       }
00238       else if (!strcasecmp(line, "status") || !strcmp(line, "\\s")) {
00239         cout << endl << "no status." << endl << endl;
00240         continue;
00241       }
00242 
00243 
00247       base = line;
00248       ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00249       while (ptr) {
00250         m_accum += string(base, ptr-base);
00251         if (m_accum.size() > 0) {
00252           boost::trim(m_accum);
00253           if (m_accum.find("#") != 0)
00254             command_queue.push(m_accum);
00255           m_accum = "";
00256           m_cont = false;
00257         }
00258         base = ptr+1;
00259         ptr = strchr(base, ';');
00260       }
00261       command = string(base);
00262       boost::trim(command);
00263       if (command != "" && command.find("#") != 0) {
00264         m_accum += command;
00265         boost::trim(m_accum);
00266       }
00267       if (m_accum != "") {
00268         m_cont = true;
00269         m_accum += " ";
00270       }
00271 
00272       while (!command_queue.empty()) {
00273         if (command_queue.front() == "quit" || command_queue.front() == "exit") {
00274           if (!m_batch_mode)
00275             write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00276           return 0;
00277         }
00278         command = command_queue.front();
00279         command_queue.pop();
00280         if (!strncmp(command.c_str(), "pause", 5)) {
00281           std::string sec_str = command.substr(5);
00282           boost::trim(sec_str);
00283           char *endptr;
00284           long secs = strtol(sec_str.c_str(), &endptr, 0);
00285           if (secs == 0 && errno == EINVAL || *endptr != 0) {
00286             cout << "error: invalid seconds specification" << endl;
00287             if (m_batch_mode)
00288               return 1;
00289           }
00290           else
00291             poll(0, 0, secs*1000);
00292         }
00293         else
00294           m_interp_ptr->execute_line(command);
00295       }
00296 
00297     }
00298     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00299       cerr << "Error: " << e.what() << " - " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << endl;
00300       if (m_batch_mode)
00301         return 1;
00302       m_accum = "";
00303       while (!command_queue.empty())
00304         command_queue.pop();
00305       m_cont=false;
00306     }
00307 
00308   }
00309 
00310   if (!m_batch_mode)
00311     write_history(ms_history_file.c_str());
00312   return 0;
00313 
00314 }
